jd: From: Isaac, Centraprise isaac@centraprise.com Reply to: isaac@centraprise.com Hi Professional, I am writing to let you know regarding a job opportunity as “Snowflake Python Developer” with “Cognizant”. Mentioned is the job description for your review. Job Title: Snowflake Python Developer Location: Chicago IL (Day One Onsite) Need Locals Or Ex Cognizant Job Type: Contract Job Description: Snowflake Python Developer If interested, please fill the below details and revert with your updated resume. Candidate Full Name Current Location Phone Email ID Skype ID Passport number Total Years of Experience Education Visa Status Willing to relocate Rate Last 4 Digits of SSN#: Availability to start on the project Previously worked with Cognizant (Y/N) If Yes – Provide the CTS Emp ID Interview Availability with the time Zone Thanks & Regards Isaac Isaac@centraprise.com Direct: 469-923-8111 Centraprise
